text: The single-story home she bought is set on nearly one-half acre and has stellar views of the bay and coastline. Built in 1937 and remodeled, the house features a new kitchen, vaulted beamed ceilings, wood-plank flooring, three bedrooms and four bathrooms.
title: Lauren Conrad buys $8.5-million home in Laguna Beach [Photos]
